sentences.english: This is probably the result of long and boring office hours, when nothing interesting happens.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是漫长无聊刻板的办公时间导致的。

sentences.english: I didn't take part in any artistic activities for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 那段日子很漫长，不参加任何艺事活动。

sentences.english: Although there are a lot of good time at that time, but also has a period of sadness long memory.
sentences.chinese: 那时虽有大把的好辰光，却也有一段忧伤漫长的记忆。

sentences.english: Later, Gongxing Lun at the beginning of a long self-study and examination, a full 7 years.
sentences.chinese: 后来，龚兴伦开头了漫长的自学和考试，整整7年。

sentences.english: STEVE EMBER: Georgia O’Keefe received many honors during her long life.
sentences.chinese: 格鲁吉亚奥基夫在她漫长生命中获得了许多荣誉。

sentences.english: They lazed away the long summer days.
sentences.chinese: 他们懒懒散散地混过了漫长的夏天。

sentences.english: The long day and night was over, satisfactorily, we thought.
sentences.chinese: 我们以为，漫长的一天一夜圆满结束了。

sentences.english: Grass regrows after the long winter.
sentences.chinese: 青草经过漫长的冬季后能重新生长。

sentences.english: Nothing can keep us from walking off the livelong night.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么能阻拦我们走出这漫漫长夜。

sentences.english: He performed in long and complex ballets.
sentences.chinese: 他的表现在漫长而复杂的芭蕾舞剧。

sentences.english: Inman tong-held embarked on a long dangerous way home.
sentences.chinese: 英曼就此踏上了漫长艰险的回家路。

sentences.english: The move toward worldwide peace and prosperity is a marathon, not a sprint.
sentences.chinese: 通往全球和平和繁荣之路是漫长的，不能一蹴而就。

sentences.english: "It's been a long day and I took out my aggravation on you.
sentences.chinese: “这是一个漫长的一天，我对你这么凶恶。

sentences.english: She fixed me up with enough warm clothes to last all winter.
sentences.chinese: 整个漫长的冬季，她给我足够的暖衣。

sentences.english: Pikas get a rude awakening from their long hibernation.
sentences.chinese: 鼠兔在漫长的冬眠后被粗鲁的唤醒。

sentences.english: Dave Katzman believes he'll enjoy a long career.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫卡茨曼相信他会好好享受一个漫长的职业生涯。

definition: to pass/to spend (time)/to survive/to get through
